response.original_title: A New Spring in the Field of Manchurian Cranes
response.overview: Rampant exaggerations, bureaucracy and formalism amongst officials at a farm in Paekhak village disappear after a new party secretary takes charge, transforming and revitalising the farm. The production is directly tied to the “Exaggeration Prevention Act” adopted in North Korea in May 2022, aiming to prevent exaggerations and false reports, particularly in the agricultural industry.
response.title: A New Spring in the Field of Manchurian Cranes
